Created an attachment (id=54969)
more log info. The handle error seems apposite.

Thank you for the bug report.

The real problem here appears to be that your system ran out of resource handles. Once this happens the behavior of Eclipse is very unstable and unpredictable.

Do you have a reproduceable test case to get into this state?

I see your point. I don't think I have a repro.

Here's what I don't understand: only eclipse seemed to be suffering from a shortage of anything. Everything else was fine.
Please reopen if you believe this bug to be specific to the Eclipse Ant integration.
